title: T3 Portable SSDs
extract: Samsung describes the Portable SSD T3 as "a premium, palm-sized, external solid state drive (SSD) that offers multi-terabyte (TB) storage capacity. ... The T3 also works with a brand-new complementary Samsung Portable SSD Android mobile app which supports password changes and remaining capacity checks".Jan 4, 2016
extract_html: Samsung describes the Portable SSD T3 as "a premium, palm-sized, external solid state drive (SSD) that offers multi-terabyte (TB) storage capacity. ... The T3 also works with a brand-new complementary Samsung Portable SSD Android mobile app which supports password changes and remaining capacity checks".Jan 4, 2016
